attributes.action: Put in place that expenses of MP be taxed like any other persons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the expenses of MPs be taxed like any other normal persons'. This perk should not be exempted tax. MPs pensions should also be subjected to the raids by the treasury like my pension which has been withered down to virtually worthless.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
